Reviews.Title: “small room and unhelpful staff”

Reviews.Content: booked 2 nights stay disappointed hotel tiny shower wc caravan staff unhelpful extra pillows joy breakfast basic tea juice

Reviews.Content: stayed nights walk pimlico tube double prefab miniscule ensuite bathroom clean slept price london 44 pounds double day wifi cost pound day basic breakfast included manager bit offhand welcoming real complaints

Reviews.Content: london conference booked single offered single ok initially day 1200 am told ive moved told hotel 2 min box box bed 2 feet wide 5 feet tall barely contain bed thats confronted manager person rude offered refund leave apparently didnt single vacant accepted reservation please aware book

Reviews.Content: arrived late night infomed booked available friends stay hotel mile manager extremely bad attitude unhelpful stayed night transferred hotel impressed staff received cooperation stories electrical faults water unprofessional

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel february expecting price paid â£55 nicely furnished matching furniture flat screen tv bathroom spotless cant comment breakfast served 8am 9am sleep close nice local shops restaurants happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”

Reviews.Content: ok palace price centrally located hotel walking distance victoria train coach stations charming beautiful buildings parks etc close trouble using bathrooms facilities ok preference duvets bed blankets personally chose sleep top bed instead

Reviews.Title: “Great cheap hotel, worth a look”
Reviews.Author: kate8624
Reviews.Content: low prices hotel definately attractive option reading reviews expected worst pleasantly suprised hotel price cant expect luxury clean decent bed mounted tv sufficent shower hot water water pressure comfortable reception polite helpful hotel perfect cheap accommodation basics location definately recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “For backpackers far better than reviews suggest”
Reviews.Author: walkun
Reviews.Content: low budget choice location ok spend nights definetely spa hotel narrow staircase shower toilet feeling reminiscent airplanes havent seen bedbugs mold alike reviews mentioned staff wasnt unfriendly poorly understand english guess breakfast simple tea toast business hah pretty satisfied ok price

Reviews.Title: “I've been in far worse hotels, much better than most reviews suggest!”
Reviews.Author: Dazmb
Reviews.Content: summary ok hotel pay double ensuite fine cant vouch single shared bathrooms guess worse pay london hotels pay night expect ok stayed 4 nights business trip read reviews ta fearing worst pleasantly surprised actually pretty middling terms quality cleanliness issues hotel nice reception entrance marble steps looks recent money spent refurbishment true carpets throughout decor ensuite top floor nice newish bathroom whilst totally adequate beds day bin emptied towels clean noise levels low outside decent victoria local shops pubs plentiful major public transport links safety smoke detectors cameras key cards bad bit damp hotel stairways odour damp window landings help diffuse odour little bit dry paint flakes carpet stairway woodwork bit tlc breakfast breakfast hotel imo breakfast basic poor especially breakfast lasts 1 hour improvement cleanliness food lady breakfast spends time talking mobile phone east european language

Reviews.Content: wow minutes walk victoria stations sites thats positive im afraid arrived hotel check handed details guy couldnt check list despite names 4 time discovered ready 3 hours despite paying extra check via internet left bags clean faults leaking toilet letting water seal base broken despite efforts absolutely tiny ensuite hey london concern bed incredibly uncomfortable due main street woken incidents involving police cars screaming sirens blaring 2 hours sleep hotels fault refreshing continental breakfast look forward continental meaning corn flakes dispenser flimsy bread tea rank milk orange juice dispensed ladies guarding kitchen disgusting elsewhere breakfast breakfast tiny accommodate guests clean dow table previous users 2 ladies run kitchen busy chat glad hostel hotel prices

Reviews.Title: “There are better value hotels than this one.”
Reviews.Author: FALEVILLE
Reviews.Content: stayed 3days europe dont wrong hotel nicer hotels worth money paid paid 55 pounds night bathroom shower narrow close door bathroom whoever cleaned literally threw covers blankets didnt vaccum bathroom shower toilet shower didnt shower curtain wet especially toilet paper management curtain told mebut space shower hall corridor breakfast smelt damp breakfast basic cereal toast etc internet crap pay staying value else london im nz cent counts equal dollars
